text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: With the “Emperor Prize (Autumn)” approaching, let's forget about this winter cold for 2 minutes during this heat! She came back on stage!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: The “Triple Crown Horse Girl” Narita Brian was faced with an injury in front of the “Emperor Prize (Spring)” is now ready to run with full satisfaction!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: What kind of race will she show us today, she has already received overwhelming support and has been promoted to the No. 1 favorite!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: I have been waiting for you since spring～! I want to see Brian run!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Maybe a record time will come out again! I can't wait～!
I focused on watching the injury, so we didn't always have time for good training, still your condition is not bad.
And above all, your desire to run here is the same as before. Show me the best run!
And above all, your desire to run here is the same as before. Show me the best run!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …I will do as long as I can.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Turn the final corner, the last straight line! Each girl spurted at this single sound!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Oops!? Narita Brian, isn't going for a massive stretch!? In the meantime the follow-up is coming!
In AutumnーNarita Brian got 12th place in her return race, and it ended with an unexpected result.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Heh… heh…
Yeah, the feeling is not bad. The legs also have good movement.
I'm afraid her injury hasn't healed completelyーthat's what I thought, but Narita Brian is working hard on training to show such a state.
Okay, then next, let's run assuming the final straight line. The next race is “Japan Cup”, the last straight line at the Tokyo racetrack is long.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Last spurt… that's what it means.
Yeah, but what's wrong?
Yeah, but what's wrong?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Sorry, but can you change it to another practice? I'll do the spurt myself later.
I don't mind that…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: The “Japan Cup” is longer than the “Emperor Prize (Autumn)”, I want to focus on adjusting the pace distribution.
Well then, let's do pace-distribution training.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I will be going.
…This is the first time she has ever asked me to change the training meny.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I've heard that her injury healed, so why…?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Mayano! Training is already starting!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ah, Mm-hmm! I'm coming now!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: …I'm watching Brian run, but it's a bit of a blur. I'm not as excited as I was back then…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: …Brian-san.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: TV Host:『Speak a word for the fans who watched Narita Brian's race live』

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: TV Guest A:『If you think calmly, this is normal. She was resting for six months』

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: TV Guest B:『That's right! Brian's complete resurrection is in the next race!』

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Both on Tv and the news are saying that this result is due to the 6 months break after the injury.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: There is also the fact that the race intuition has gotten pure, besides it's very difficult to bring your condition to its peak immediately after your return.
I've been watching Brian win so much, so I tend to forget common senseー
It's not easy to win a race after an injury break. That's why we have to make adjustments before the “Japan Cup”.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yeah… You're right.
I'm not without anxiety. Her running has always been beyond the frame of common sense.
It was also true that I did not handle her injury properly since the day she got it, even though it was common sense what to do.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Heh… heh…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …I'm sorry Trainer, even so I…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I will choose to run on my own now…

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: 200m left!! Hishi Amazon is leading the way! Narita Brian has a hard time catching up!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Hishi Amazon, reaches the goal with slightly 2 lengths! Narita Brian is further behind, passing the goal board in 6th position!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Like the “Emperor Prize (Autumn)”, it was a race that could not be extended even in this “Japan Cup”!
